quest.name: Prayers and Poison
journal:
Qhoterl Pasol knows that it pays to be prepared.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.
objectives: Mine splendid chalcanthite at the HuskDeliver the splendid chalcanthite to Qhoterl PasolGather splendid tarantulas at the HuskDeliver the splendid tarantulas to Qhoterl PasolCatch a splendid poison catfish at Mjrl's TearsDeliver the splendid poison catfish to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Thanks to the protective enchantments of the Night's Blessed, we may carry out our exploration without fear of fiends. Of course, enchantments are wont to lose effect over time, and when that happens, we must be prepared to protect ourselves.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: To that end, I intend to concoct a potent poison, and I would be most grateful if you could obtain an ingredient for me.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Chalcanthite is what I require, and it can be mined at the Husk. Three clusters or so should be suitable for our purposes.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Tarantulas are what I require, and they can be found at the Husk. Three or so should be suitable for our purposes.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: A poison catfish is what I require, and it can be caught at Mjrl's Tears with a fruit worm on your hook. A single creature should be suitable for our purposes.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Please bring me the three chalcanthite clusters I require to make my poison. Remember, they can be mined at the Husk.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Please bring me the three tarantulas I require to make my poison. Remember, they can be found at the Husk.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Please bring me the poison catfish I require to make my poison. Remember, they can be caught at Mjrl's Tears with a fruit worm on your hook.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Pleased for your return, good madamsir. Were you successful in procuring the ingredient I requested?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Splendid, my thanks for your kind cooperation. Lest you wonder, the poison works by robbing fiends of their movement. Applied to dart tips, it won't slay outright, but it will afford us an opportunity to retreat to safety.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Of course, I pray that our people needn't resort to such measures at all. May merciful Dalan ever bless us and keep us safe from harm.
